high_descs: Turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the purple pillow on the bed.
Turn left, bring the pillow to the lamp on the small table next to the door.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow by the light of the lamp on the small table.

high_descs: Turn right and turn around to face the bed.
Pick up the purple pillow from the bed.
Turn left and walk to the small wooden nightstand with the small lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the pillow on the bed.
Turn left and walk forward to face the lamp.
Turn on the lamp to examine the pillow.
anns.task_desc: To examine a pillow by lamp light.
